p.name: Purl
p.description: The basic purl stitch, the reverse of a knit stitch.

kfb.name: Knit Front and Back
kfb.description: A single-stitch increase. Knit into the front of the stitch, but before sliding it off, knit into the back of the same stitch.

m1L.name: Make 1 Left
m1L.description: An increase that slants to the left. Pick up the bar between stitches from front to back and knit it through the back loop.

m1R.name: Make 1 Right
m1R.description: An increase that slants to the right. Pick up the bar between stitches from back to front and knit it through the front loop.

yo.name: Yarn Over
yo.description: An increase that creates a small decorative hole, essential for lace. Bring the yarn over the right needle.

ssk.name: Slip, Slip, Knit
ssk.description: A decrease that slants to the left. Slip two stitches knitwise one at a time, then knit them together through the back loops.

k2tog.name: Knit 2 Together
k2tog.description: A decrease that slants to the right. Knit the next two stitches together as if they were one.

cdd.name: Centered Double Decrease
cdd.description: A decrease that reduces three stitches to one without a slant. Slip two stitches as if to knit them together, knit the next stitch, then pass the two slipped stitches over.

sm.name: Slip Marker
sm.description: Move the stitch marker from the left needle to the right needle.

instructions.displayText: Row 1 (RS): k3, kfb, k1, m1L, sm, k1, sm, m1R, k1, kfb, k3. (15 sts)
Repeat Rows (RS): k3, kfb, k to marker, m1L, sm, k1, sm, m1R, k to last 4, kfb, k3. (+4 sts)
Repeat Rows (WS): k3, purl to last 3, k3.
Row 63 (RS): k3, kfb, (yo, ssk, k5, k2tog, yo, k1) 6 times, k3, m1L, k1, m1R, k3, (yo, ssk, k5, k2tog, yo, k1) 6 times, kfb, k3. (139 sts)
